critique: The executive order aims to convey a sense of optimism and confidence in the potential of AI while also highlighting the need for caution and responsible development. It seeks to instill a feeling of preparedness and proactive governance in the face of a rapidly evolving technology. The order also touches on themes of equity and justice, aiming to reassure the audience that AI will be used to benefit all members of society. The order does not want to convey anger, fear, or disgust. Surprise is not a primary emotion, but a sense of wonder at the possibilities of AI is present.
